channel.title: Website Template Development [Update]
channel.description:
[center]Started Working on this for about a couple hours now, but starting to get a little bit better at html and css! Have been studying and coding some templates a lot lately but I will release this one when it is done!
So far what I have accomplished! [code]Fixed Nav Bar to make it flow better with template Added Jquery Slider made some adjustments to it Text Scrolling Across Screen <marquee>[/code]
Here is what it looks like at the moment! [img]http://imageshack.us/a/img534/7343/releasetemp.jpg[/img]
[/center]
[center][size=18pt]Tell me what you think so far and I know its not a lot of stuff at all but still in the process of making it![/size][/center]
[b]Updated May 12th[/b]
